name: Bubble Shoot: New Planet Explo
description:
Bubble Shoot: New Planet Exploration is a fun bubble shooting game with hundreds of addictive levels, beautiful graphics and awesome boosts. Aim carefully to hit the target and make these bubbles pop. It’s super fun!
Features:
-Aim and tap to shoot bubbles
-Pop bubbles strategically to make more combos and power-ups
-Save all the lovely chickens to level up
-Exquisite game interface
-Applicable for any ages to play at anywhere and anytime
